Text: dear sheila6: I was visiting Kew in 2005(?), of course I love them.  They claim to have the largest compost pile, but from USA standard it is a very snall one . What I have in my garden probably just as big. Too bad I did not have the time to visit more and get inot behind-the-scene.  Thanks for UL
Thank you very much for your time and effort to share this with us.
